author: iwarnes3
title: Britain’s most notorious inmate Charles Bronson asks girlfriend to marry him during Valentine’s Day prison visit
text:
Opinion be my violentine Britain’s most notorious inmate Charles Bronson asks girlfriend to marry him during Valentine’s Day prison visit 
Soap actress Paula Williamson wore a necklace of her lag lover's name when she visited him at HMP Wakefield and gushed about their relationship Exclusive BY SEAN-PAUL DORAN AND PAUL SIMS 13th February 2017, 11:57 pm
